thread.title: This Morning's Research Reports on Wireless Communications Stocks -- Sprint, Telephone and Data Systems, Globalstar, and NII Holdings

author: cnbc.com
title: This Morning's Research Reports on Wireless Communications Stocks -- Sprint, Telephone and Data Systems, Globalstar, and NII Holdings

organizations.name: research reports on wireless communications stocks

text:
NEW YORK, May 2, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on S, TDS, GSAT, and NIHD which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . WallStEquities.com turns investors' attention to the Wireless Telecommunications Services industry, which consists of companies that are engaged in providing wireless communication services, such as paging, cell phone, and other satellite telecommunication services. Under review this morning are the following four stocks: Sprint Corp. (NYSE: S), Telephone and Data Systems Inc. (NYSE: TDS), Globalstar Inc. (NYSE AMER: GSAT), and NII Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ: NIHD). All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below. www.wallstequities.com/registration
Sprint
Overland Park, Kansas headquartered Sprint Corp.'s stock finished Tuesday's session 3.39% lower at $5.42. A total volume of 43.96 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 16.22 million shares. The Company's shares have advanced 11.75% in the past month and 2.46% in the previous three months. The stock is trading 0.03% below its 50-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Sprint, which through its subsidiaries, provides various wireless and wireline communications products and services to consumers, businesses, government subscribers, and resellers in the US, Puerto Rico, and the US Virgin Islands, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 44.43.
On April 30 th , 2018, Sprint announced that it will release its Q4 FY17 financial results at approximately 4:05 p.m. ET on May 02 nd , 2018. Management will host a conference call at 4:30 p.m. ET that same day to discuss the results. A simultaneous webcast will be available on the Company's investors website.
On May 01 st , 2018, research firm Jefferies upgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Underperform' to 'Hold'. Get the full research report on S for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=S
Telephone and Data Systems
On Tuesday, shares in Chicago, Illinois headquartered Telephone and Data Systems Inc. recorded a trading volume of 1.20 million shares, which was above their three months average volume of 753,950 shares. The stock ended the session 8.01% lower at $25.14. The Company's shares are trading 9.29% below their 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of the Company, which provides wireless, wireline, cable, and hosted and managed services in the US, have an RSI of 23.38. Download our actionable research report on TDS at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=TDS
Globalstar
Covington, Louisiana headquartered Globalstar Inc.'s shares closed the day 3.94% higher at $0.64. The stock recorded a trading volume of 4.48 million shares. The Company's shares have gained 5.62% in the last month. The stock is trading 18.58% below its 50-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Globalstar, which provides mobile satellite voice and data services worldwide, have an RSI of 40.02.
On April 25 th , 2018, Globalstar announced that it has signed a merger agreement with Thermo Acquisitions, Inc., pursuant to which the following assets will be combined with the former: metro fiber provider FiberLight, LLC; 15.5 million shares of common stock of CenturyLink, Inc.; $100 million of cash and minority investments in complementary businesses and assets of $25 million in exchange for Globalstar's common stock valued at approximately $1.65 billion, subject to adjustments. Register for your free report coverage on GSAT at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=GSAT
NII Holdings
Shares in Reston, Virginia headquartered NII Holdings Inc. finished 2.55% higher at $2.82. The stock recorded a trading volume of 625,271 shares. The Company's shares have surged 38.24% in the last month, 362.30% in the previous three months, and 252.32% over the past year. The stock is trading above its 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 43.91% and 226.28%, respectively. Furthermore, shares of NII Holdings, which through its subsidiaries, provides wireless communication services to the individual consumers under the Nextel brand in Brazil, have an RSI of 67.16.
On April 30 th , 2018, NII Holdings announced that it will host its Q1 2018 results conference call with its senior management on May 08 th , 2018, from 8:30 a.m. EST to 9:00 a.m. EST. The call will be available via webcast under the Investor Relations page of the Company's website. Get the free research report on NIHD at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=NIHD
--
Wall St. Equities :
Wall St. Equities (WSE) produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. WSE has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps. Such sponsored content is outside the scope of procedures detailed below.
WSE has not been compensated; directly or indirectly; for producing or publishing this document.
